name: namespace.style
description: A zero-dependency CSS class composer, bringing structure + types to the intersection between HTML + CSS

scripts.build: npm run -s verify & npm run -s bundle & wait && npm run -s info
scripts.verify: npm run type & npm run format
scripts.info:
cd dist && echo && for file in `ls`; do printf "%-28s %10s
" "dist/${file}#" "#$( ls -l $file | tr -s ' ' | cut -d' ' -f5 | awk '{print $1/1000}' )KB" | tr ' ' 'Â·' | tr '#' ' '; done && echo
scripts.release: git push private main && git push public main && npm publish

author: Evan Purcer
